Description: Upon usage, restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Mod1.Stamina]}</font> stamina every second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Mod1.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Landing a pellet, even if blocked, lowers the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Mod2.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> each.

Successful pulls will automatically grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1</font> loaded ammunition. If you currently have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> loaded ammunition this will exceed the max cap and grant a third.
If Net Shot hits a target, reduce its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_NetShot_Mod1.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

The net now inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_NetShot_Upgraded.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> that degrades to normal move speed over <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_NetShot_Upgraded.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Net Shot's initial hit is reduced to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Net_Shot_Upgraded_Final.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_thrust_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage. However, it now deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_BarbedNet.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_bleed_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>additional weapon damage as <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeding</font> each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_BarbedNet.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Fire <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5</font> shots in a horizontal fan in front of you while pushing yourself backwards. Each shot will deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Azoth_Shrapnel.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Every consecutive hit on the same target will deal {[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_AzothShrapnelBlast.BaseDamage * -100]}% less damage than the previous hit.)</font>
Increase the range of this attack from <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">12m</font> to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">16m</font>.
Fire <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> additional pellets with each use of this ability.

Each individual hit from this ability or from the blunderbuss primary fire will lower the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_AzothShrapnelBlast_Mod3.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Fire a singular bomb down the center of the fan. This bomb will implant itself in the world and explode dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_ASB_Bomb.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> area after a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font> delay

The last shot loaded into the blunderbuss will do <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_DeepLoad.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage.

Successful hits within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_FortifyCloseRange.DistFromDefender]}m</font> grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_FortifyCloseRange.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_FortifyCloseRange.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Basic shots restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_FutureEndeavor_Stam.Stamina]}</font> stamina per pellet hit.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Reloads</font> give you a damage boost of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Ramp.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Ramp.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Ramp.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Reloading</font> gives you a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Run_And_Gun.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Run_And_Gun.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

The next shot fired within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Nine.BaseDuration]}s</font> after triggering an ability will have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">8</font> pellets instead of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6</font>.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Mod1.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to targets greater than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Mod1.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Any grenade hit grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Movespeed.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Movespeed.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Multiple hits will refresh the duration.)</font>

Splitting Grenade explosions inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font> on hit, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Burn.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Burn.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Burn.StackMax]} times.)</font>

Load the blunderbuss with heavy canisters. For the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">15s</font> or <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> shots, shots will no longer fire multiple pellets but instead will fire a heavy, fast diving, mortar-style canister that causes a tall explosion upon impact, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Mortar_Charge.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> area. \n\nIf the target is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_MortarShot.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away or further, they will take <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_MortarShot.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage from the mortar.
Each hit grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SmallStam.Stamina]}</font> stamina.

Firing grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Freedom.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Freedom.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>
Gain an extra canister, you can now fire up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> shots.

Blast Shot applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font>, decreasing armor of all targets affected by this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Increase_Damage_Taken.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Increase_Damage_Taken.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

The area <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10m</font> in front of you remains influenced by wind for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LingeringFlow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. You and your allies gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LingeringFlow.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> move speed bonus while in the area.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

Direct damage from abilities is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Artillery.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> if the victim is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Artillery.DistFromDefender]}m</font> or further away.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Buckshot.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to any target as long as you have not damaged them in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Buckshot.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Using an ability reduces all other ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_FuturePlanning.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Every pellet that is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font> reduces all cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_BiteBack.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Holding onto <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> loaded ammunition for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_OverloadTimer.BaseDuration]}s</font> after a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reload</font> will load a 3rd active ammunition.

Triggering an ability grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_AbilityRamp.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_AbilityRamp.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_AbilityRamp.StackMax]} times.) (Fortify increases armor)</font>

Whenever you take a hit and your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_LastChance.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LastChance.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LastChance.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LastChanceCooldown.BaseDuration]}s cooldown)</font>

Once every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ChargeCooldownOnCooldown.BaseDuration]}s</font>, your next ability used will have its cooldown reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Charge.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
